column4: Typo_King: I made some progress.. take a look at this paste from my terminal... compiz is actually reporting the problem now so i have somthing to work with... http://paste.ubuntu.com/40284
Your drivers are using swrast. Please pastebin /var/log/Xorg.0.log file
and please come to #compiz to paste the link so we can help you in a less crowded environment
